title: We CAN Have Nice Things: Upgrading to Java 21 Is Worth It
author: Josh Long
description: New Relic’s Annual State of Java Ecosystem report shows slow adoption of newer versions. Java champion Josh Long has thoughts.
cntitle: 我们可以拥有美好的事物：升级到 Java 21 是值得的
cndescription: New Relic 的年度 Java 生态系统状况报告显示较新版本的采用速度较慢。Java 拥护者 Josh Long 有想法。
